description:
2011-05-17 11:36:16,750 DEBUG nova.rpc [-] Making asynchronous cast on compute.nova... from (pid=21070) cast /home/jkearney/openstack/nova/nova/rpc.py:411
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/eventlet/hubs/hub.py", line 336, in fire_timers
    timer()
  File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/eventlet/hubs/timer.py", line 56, in __call__
    cb(*args, **kw)
TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not callable

This came up while resetting the root password of an instance.
title: Getting TypeError from eventlet during RPC cast in API
